name: Verify to create new account based on the customer just created above

testSteps.description: Example #1: {username=mngr201145, userpass=urEpUta, customername=Loc Nguyen, accounttype=Current, initialdeposit=11000}

children.description: Given Login with "mngr201145" and "urEpUta" and navigate to New Account

When Add new account page is loaded
| Add new account form |
Then Enter valid values to create new account "Current", "11000"
Then Verify new account information "Loc Nguyen", "Current", "11000"
